Name: Enforce
Description: Deal 2 damage. If it is dealt to a minion, subdue it.

Name: Enforce
Description: Deal 2 damage. If it is dealt to a minion, subdue it.

Name: Throw in the Slammer
Description: Deal 2 damage, or 5 damage instead if it is dealt to a subdued minion.

Name: Throw in the Slammer
Description: Deal 2 damage, or 5 damage instead if it is dealt to a subdued minion.

Name: Lay down the Law
Description:
Deal 2 damage to each subdued minion. 
Subdue each minion.

Name: Lay down the Law
Description:
Deal 2 damage to each subdued minion. 
Subdue each minion.

Name: Interrogate
Description: Remove any number of subdue counters from among all minions. Heal X damage, where X is twice the number of counters removed.

Name: Crackdown
Description: Deal 5 damage to each subdued minions.
